entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:43 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -34.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Partly cloudy. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 41 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 41 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
